title: HMCL启动失败
author: steve01
txt_content:
错误日志如下：
[16:49:27] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassCastException: java.base/jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader cannot be cast to java.base/java.net.URLClassLoader
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.<init>(Launch.java:34)
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
求大佬解答，

replies.author: 零尘233
replies.txt_content:
steve01 发表于 2018-10-4 19:49
这样啊
之前用的jdk7，换了台电脑就装了11
那么还是装回jdk7吗？
装Java8啊(虽然我知道有部分mod支持Java9以上 但不推荐)

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content:
重新安装java和客户端
你用的是什么版本的java？

replies.author: steve01
replies.txt_content:
zyjking 发表于 2018-10-4 17:05
重新安装java和客户端
你用的是什么版本的java？
最新的jdk11啦

replies.author: steve01
replies.txt_content:

之前用的jdk7，换了台电脑就装了11
